name: FilmFanTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open film fan trivia”
”Alexa, start film fan trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: film fan trivia
des: Do you love movies? Here is the trivia game for you! Test your knowledge across all genres from blockbusters, indies, comedies and more that were made from the 80's to present. While playing this game, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next question. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the quiz. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
